page.title: 04Lover Week, Redlynch
page.content: This year,1985, the village of Lover held a special Lover week in June.All sorts of events took place in the village. For children there was a disco,a pet show and a sports evening followed by a barbecue.Adults could enjoy a social evening,the beer festival and see the Redlynch Players acting in the village hall. A vintage vehicle display was organised.The village hall housed an exhibition assembled by local people.The highlight of the week was the fete opened by our{M.P.Mr Robert {Key}.A keep fit group,morris dancers and a motor cycle display team entertained us. On the final day 50 or more took part in the village walk.An open air service brought the week to an end.
